Mauricio is 44 years old and lives in his own house with his family of four children and his wife. He has made a living in agriculture for several years, especially through the cultivation of güisquil [a tropical pear-shaped fruit]. He sells the fruit in neighboring areas. 

Mauricio is requesting a loan to buy the necessary agricultural supplies such as: fertilizers, pest controls, manure, etc. and thus be able to continue fulfilling his commitments as father of his family. This is their only source of income and he hopes to be able to give his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers, pest controls, manure, etc.

loans.name: Eva

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “KIMOYGANAKERA MAGANIROIGI”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Echarate, perteneciente a la provincia de La Convención y departamento de Cusco.

La socia Eva se dedica al negocio de agricultura,la socia tambien trabaja como profesora, ella tiene un terreno donde cultiva cacao y café, la socia trabaja desde las 6:00 a.m hasta las 5:00 p.m,la socia ya tiene varios años en este negocio y le va muy bien, el sueño de la socia es ampliar su terreno de cultivo. La socia solicita le crédito para comprar semillas y fertilizantes.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
This member belongs to the communal bank "KIMOYGANAKERA MAGANIROIGI" which is located in the district of Echarate in the province of La Convención, department of Cusco.

Eva works in agriculture and also teaches.  She has land where she grows cocoa and coffee.  Her schedule is 6:00 a.m. to 5:00 p.m. and she has been in this business for several years with very good results.  Eva's dream is to expand her cropland.  She is requesting a loan to buy seeds and fertilizers.

The member is grateful for the loan and committed to paying it back on time.

loans.use: To buy seeds and fertilizers.

loans.name: Navy's Group

texts.en: Navy is a 45-year-old mother of six children, two of whom are in school. To overcome the family's hardship, Navy is growing cassava and rice as the main source of income. She has been involved with this business for six years and it has earned her more than 40,000 KHR per day. She is an original borrower with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner) and she leads a group of two. She is seeking a loan of 1,000,000 KHR and her co-borrower is requesting a loan of 400,000 KHR. As the leader, she will spend her entire loan portion to pay for plowing and labor fees and to buy seeds. She hopes to improve her lifestyle.

loans.use: to pay for plowing and labor fees and to buy seeds

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase more stock

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy more wholesale clothing.

loans.name: Guillermina

texts.es:
La socia Guillermina se sigue dedicando al negocio de venta de ropa y flores, la socia vende pantalones, blusas y polos, la socia ya tiene varios años en este negocio y le va muy bien, el sueño de la socia es tener un bazar. La socia solicita le crédito para comprar zapatos, polos, chompas, polos y blusas.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en: Guillermina continues making a living from her business selling clothing and flowers. She sells pants, blouses and shirts. She has had this business for several years and it is going very well. Her dream is to have a bazaar. She is requesting a loan to buy shoes, shirts, sweaters, and blouses. She is happy to receive the loan and is committed to making her payments.

loans.use: to buy shoes, shirts, sweaters, and blouses

loans.name: Gladis Elizabeth

texts.es:
Gladis  de 35 años de edad, no tuvo la oportunidad de estudiar, es la primera  de seis hermanos por lo cual tuvo que trabajar desde muy pequeña para ayudar a su madre, hoy en día está acompañada y su pareja se dedica a la agricultura, tiene 3 hijos que estudian en la escuela y son los únicos que dependen de ella.
  
Gladis trabaja en la agricultura junto a su esposo, trabaja tres horas y luego hace el almuerzo para cuando sus hijos regresen de la escuela, siempre se ha dedicado a la siembra de granos básicos y el lugar de trabajo está a 300 metros de su casa. 

El préstamo solicitado a CrediCampo lo necesita para comprar cerdos, pues quiere engordarlos para luego  vender la carne, también comprará materiales para construir la granja donde los va a encerrar, de esta forma tendrá otra fuente de ingreso con el cual estará ayudando a su esposo con los gastos del hogar. 
  
Su sueño es tener otra fuente de ingreso por lo que le gusta el negocio de engorde de cerdos y también le ayudara a la comunidad por que les venderá carne sin contaminantes, y por supuesto sueña con que sus hijos se preparen académicamente.
texts.en:
Gladis, 35, was unable to get an education.  She is the eldest of six siblings and had to start working at a very young age to help her mother.  Now she lives in a common-law relationship and her husband works in agriculture.  They have three dependent children who attend school.

Gladis works with her husband three hours a day and then makes lunch for the children when they get home from school.  Basic grains have always been the crops she grows on the land which is 300 meters from home.

The loan she is requesting through CrediCampo is to buy pigs that she will raise and later sell as pork meat.  She also will buy materials to build a pig pen.  This will give her extra income to help her husband cover household expenses.

Her goal is to have another source of income and she likes the pig business.  She also will be able to help the community by selling ecological meat.  Of course, she also wants her children to get an education.

loans.use: To buy pigs and sell pork meat.

loans.name: Jhonatan Alexander

texts.es:
Jhonatan es un joven emprendedor, tiene 22 años de edad, es soltero y vive en Ica junto a sus padres.
Desde hace varios años brinda servicios de Vigilancia y actualmente trabaja en una empresa prestigiosa también prestando servicio de Vigilancia. Es una persona con muchos deseos de superación y de poder mejorar su calidad de vida.
Jhonatan está agradecido con los prestamistas Kiva porque con el apoyo que le han brindado él podrá comprarse una moto para poder movilizarse de su casa a su trbaja y ahorrar los pasajes, de esta manera mejorará su calidad de vida y podrá utilizar sus ahorros para otras necesidades.
texts.en: Jhonatan is a young entrepreneur who is 22 years old and single. He lives in Ica with his parents. He has been a security guard for some years and currently works for a prestigious company. He spares no effort to improve himself professionally and make his life better. Jhonatan thanks Kiva lenders for their support, thanks to which he was able to buy a motorcycle in order to commute to work and save on transportation. This way, he can use his savings to buy other necessary items and enjoy a better standard of living.

loans.use: to buy a motorcycle for personal use.

loans.name: Irma Mariela

texts.es:
Irma tiene 24 años de edad, estudió hasta noveno grado, está acompañada y su pareja se dedica a la agricultura, ambos son los responsable de la manutención de sus 2 hijos entre y 6 años de edad, nadie mas depende de Irma.


Ella tiene un puesto de venta en el mercado, Irma vende el pan que elabora una señora, está en un punto céntrico donde circula bastante gente, tiene 4 años de dedicarse a la actividad, además tiene negocio propio donde hace pasteles, panes con pollo entre otros, su horario de trabajo es de 8:00 AM  a 3: 00 PM, y está a una distancia de un km.


El préstamo lo necesita para continuar con la elaboración de pasteles y con la venta de pan, de esta forma se le estará ayudando a Irma a que pueda continuar con su negocio.

Ella sueño con poder crecer en las ventas y con eso tener mejores ingresos, con lo que podrá cubrir sus necesidades y las de su familia.
texts.en:
Irma is 24 years old, studied through the ninth grade, and is accompanied by her partner who works in agriculture. Both are responsible for raising two children under 6 years old. Irma has no other dependents.

She has a stall in the market where she sells bread baked by an older woman. It is in a central location where many people circulate. She has been doing this work for four years. In addition she has her own business making pastries, bread with chicken, among other items. Her work schedule is from 8 a.m. to 3 p.m., and she travels one kilometer to work.

She needs the loan to continue making pastries and selling bread. The loan will help Irma continue running her business.

She dreams of being able to grow her sales and in this way increase her income, with which she will be able to cover her and her family's necessities.

loans.use: to continue making pastries and selling bread

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy fruits and vegetables wholesale.

loans.name: Mercedes

texts.es:
Mercedes, vive junto a su familia la cual está integrada por su esposa y tres hijos, los cuales dependen económicamente de él; de niño aprendió varios oficios tales como elaborar estructuras metálicas, albañilería y la agricultura, que con el pasar del tiempo ha perfeccionado y actualmente los realiza para tener ingresos económicos para cubrir los diferentes compromisos que posee.
Invertirá el préstamo en la compra de un soldador nuevo, le será de mucha utilidad para continuar trabajando, entregar los encargos que no ha finalizado y brindar un mejor servicio, espera incrementar el número de clientes para aumentar sus ingresos y cancelar con buen record crediticio su deuda. Foto fue tomada mientras realizaba trabajos de albañilería.
Su sueño es acondicionar un espacio más amplio para su negocio y continuar cubriendo las necesidades básicas de su hogar.
texts.en: Mercedes lives with his family, comprised of his wife and their three sons, all of whom depend on him for their subsistance. As a child, he learned several trades: soldering, bricklaying, and farming. He became better at them with time and now derives income from his various skills to put food on the table. He will use the loan in order to buy a new soldering iron, which will enable him to keep working at making metal structures and fulfilling customers' orders. By improving the service he offers, he hopes to bring in more customers and increase his income so as to reapy the loan without hurting his credit rating. The picture was taken while he was on a bricklaying job. Mercedes's dream is to build a bigger workshop for himself and to keep supporting his family.

loans.use: to buy a new soldering iron.

loans.name: Kusmiati

texts.en:
Kusmiati runs a small stall selling mobile phone airtime credits and mobile accessories. Kusmiati lives in Purwokerto, a semi-urban area about 10 hours from Jakarta. Kusmiati is married and living with three people in the family home. As seen in the picture, she with her customers.

Kusmiati began working with Ruma one month ago because she wanted to increase her income.  She feels really excited to expand her business in selling mobile phone airtime credits and serving bill payments. As the business continues to run, she hopes to get a Kiva loan as working capital in order to do more transactions on weekends.

loans.use: To process more mobile phone credit sales on the weekends

loans.name: Mom's Group

texts.en: A citizen from the Moung Russey district of Battambang province, she is a mother of six children. She is 45 years old. To strive for a living, she grows rice and works as a paid worker for her income. The business that she has been engaged in for 11 years has generated a decent income for supporting the family. She is a third-time borrower with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner) while her co-borrower is a first-time borrower. Mom has fully repaid her past loans and has improved her family. Now, she is seeking a loan with the same amount as her group member (1,000,000 KHR each). As the leader, she will spend her entire loan portion to pay for gasoline, fertilizer and pesticide for her farmland. She strongly hopes to gain a better yield than before.

loans.use: to pay for gasoline, fertilizer and pesticide

loans.name: Priscilla

texts.en:
Priscilla is a 20-year-old entrepreneur living in Gokwe South, Zimbabwe. She started a business selling jackets, shirts, skirts, shoes, slippers and dresses 10 months ago. Her motivation for starting her business was the desire to become financially independent. When she is not working in her flea market, Priscilla serves as a Learner Guide at the local secondary school. As a Learner Guide, she increases the quality of education in rural schools by teaching students about issues that impact their lives, such as peer pressure and self-esteem. 

With the Kiva loan, Priscilla intends to make bulk purchases of jackets, shirts, skirts and dresses to boost her sales and profits. Her hope is to grow the business and open her own store. This will bring stability to her business and will enable her to provide for her child once she is born.

loans.use: To make bulk purchases of jackets, shirts, skirts and dresses

loans.name: Los Lideres De San Lorenzo Group

texts.es:
La socia Yasmina pertenece al banco comunal LOS LIDERES DE SAN LORENZO, él banco está ubicado en el distrito de Ocobamba, provincia de La Convención y departamento de Cusco.
La socia Yasmina tiene 24 años de edad es conviviente y tiene 02 hijos, la socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de tienda de abarrotes, la socia vende diferentes tipos de productos como arroz, azucar, leche entre otros, la socia lleva buen tiempo con su negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de arroz entre otros para su negocio.
La persona que sale con la cara tapada no pertenece al banco comunal.
Los demás socios se dedican  al negocio de tienda de abarrotes, crianza de animales, agricultura, restaurante.
La socia se siente agradecida por el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
Group member Yasmina belongs to the communal bank "LOS LIDERES DE SAN LORENZO". The bank is located in the Ocobamba district, in the province of La Convención and the department of Cusco.

Yasmina is 24 years old and lives with her partner and two children. She alternates her daily activities with the grocery store. Yasmina sells different types of products such as rice, sugar, milk etc. She is taking her time with the business which is going well thanks to the determination she puts in each day. Yasmina wants to continue working in order to carry on supporting her family in this way. Yasmina is asking for this loan in order to buy rice etc. for her business.

The person whose face has been blanked out is not a member of the communal bank. The other members work in grocery stores, raising animals, agriculture, and restauration.

Yasmina is very grateful for the loan offered and is committed to making the repayments.

loans.use: to buy rice etc. for her business.

loans.name: Nelli

texts.en: Nelli is from Ayntap village in the Ararat region. She lives with her husband and 13-year-old daughter. Nelli works at the village ambulatory as a laborant and her husband is a policeman. Their salaries, however, are very low, and they cannot afford a living based on those salaries alone. To be able to fully meet the family’s needs, Nelli is also engaged in cultivation of corn and greens. She realizes the agricultural products in the local market, which is an important source of income for the family. To be able to continue running her agribusiness in a sustainable way, Nelli needs a loan of USD 3,000 to purchase fertilizer and cover cultivation costs. Nelli and her husband rely on the good will of the lenders and will be grateful to them for their help in collecting the needed amount of the loan.

loans.use: to pay for fertilizer and cover cultivation costs

loans.name: Angela

texts.es:
Ángela, es una persona que trabaja todo el día en la elaboración de productos de jarcia y crianza de cerdos, el negocio lo aprendió de sus padres; vive con una pequeña nieta de 11 años de edad, su trabajo no representa dificultades por el momento.
Le ayudara a comprar hilos (de seda y nylon) y concentrado para alimentar los cerdos, le permitirá aumentar la productividad, mejorar ventas y ganancias de su negocio, con lo que podrá cancelar su deuda y tener un mejor estilo de vida.
Su visión es continuar trabajando y enseñar a su nieta el oficio para que pueda heredarlo.
texts.en:
Ángela works all day making rigging products and raising pigs. She learnt the business from her parents. She lives with a small granddaughter who is 11 years old. Her work does not pose any difficulties at the moment.

The loan will help her to buy threads (silk and nylon) and feed for the pigs. It would allow her to increase productivity and improve sales and earnings of her business, with which she could pay off her debt and have a better lifestyle.

Her vision is to continue working and teach her granddaughter the trade so that she can inherit the business.

loans.use: to buy silk and nylon threads and pig feed.

loans.name: Allyza Claire

texts.en:
Allyza Claire is 20 years old and is the first of four children in the family. Her mother Yolanda supports the family through her restaurant business in the Philippines.

Allyza Claire is studying for a Bachelor of Science in Nursing and is currently in the fourth year 4th of this four-year course.

Allyza Claire is borrowing PHP 15,000 to pay for tuition fees for the first semester of the school year 2014-15.

When she graduates, Allyza Claire plans to be gainfully employed.

loans.use: to pay for tuition fees.

loans.name: Mirian Beatriz

texts.es: Mirian de 33 años de edad vive en casa propia con su grupo familiar conformado por sus cinco hijos  y su compañero de vida, ella se dedica a la venta de ropa  lo hace de forma ambulante por las diferentes colonias que se encuentran cerca de su lugar de residencia, con lo que obtiene de su trabajo y con la ayuda de su compañero de vida, logran salir adelante. Mirian está solicitando un crédito para seguir comprando blusas, faldas y otras cosas y poder seguir con sus ventas ya que esa es su única fuente de trabajo  y tener junto con su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Mirian is 33 years old and lives in her own home with her family which includes her 5 children and her life partner. She works selling clothes on a street stall in different neighbourhoods near her home. With the money she earns from her work and the help of her life partner, they manage to move ahead.

Mirian is asking for a loan to continue buying blouses, skirts etc. This will mean she is able to continue selling her products since this is her only source of income, and have a better quality of life with her family.

loans.use: to buy blouses, skirts etc.

loans.name: Hassan

texts.en: Hassan used the previous loan to buy a motorcycle. He sells produce and coffee and rides a motorcycle for a living. The major challenges faced are the high cost of farming, since he carries out his farming on a hired piece of land, and the mechanical breakdown of his motorcycle. He dreams of owning five motorcycles and a piece of land. Hassan intends to use the credit facility to buy coffee to sell.

loans.use: To buy coffee to sell

loans.name: Rachana's Group

texts.en:
Rachana is 28 years old and she is a mother of one little child. She is a villager from Sangke district of Battambang province. 

To make a living, she runs a small hair salon business. She has been involved with this business for four years and it has returned her 31,700 KHR per day. 

Now, she is seeking a loan of 1,400,000 KHR and her group co-member is applying loan for 600,000 KHR. As the leader, she will spend her entire loan portion to buy a hair steam machine to support her business. She hopes to expand her business in larger scale.

loans.use: to buy a hair steam machine.

loans.name: Rayito De Luz Para El Progreso. Group

texts.es: Este es la Alcancía “Rayito De Luz Para El Progreso” La cual  está constituido por 07 socios progresistas y emprendedores. Iamara de 20 años de edad es separada con 01 hijo dependiente. Ella se dedica a la venta de comidas como el lomo saltado. Gracias a su constante dedicación su negocio le va bien y puede cubrir con el gasto de su hogar. Iamara tiene el deseo de ampliar su negocio ofreciendo diversos menús a sus comensales. Es por ello que solicitó el crédito para la compra de arroz, carne de res, pollo y pescado. El grupo “Rayito De Luz Para El Progreso” agradece a todas las personas que facilitaron este crédito. Iamara es la cuarta del lado derecho.
texts.en: This is the “Rayito De Luz Para El Progreso” bank. It is made up of 7 progressive and entrepreneurial members. Iamara is 20 years old, separated and has 1 dependent child. She sells food, such as lomo saltado. Thanks to her constant dedication, her business is going well and she can cover her household expenses. Iamara wants to expand the business and offer diverse dishes to her customers. That is why she has asked for a loan to buy rice, beef, chicken and fish. The do “Rayito De Luz Para El Progreso” group thanks all of the people who facilitated this loan. Iamara is fourth from the right.

loans.use: to buy rice, beef, chicken and fish.

loans.name: Jemmy

texts.en:
Jemmy lives in Purwokerto, a semi urban area about 10 hours from Jakarta. He is married and living with four people in the family home. 

Jemmy runs a small stall that sells mobile phone airtime credits and snacks. He began working with Ruma two months ago because he wanted to increase his income. He feels really excited to expand his business in selling mobile phone airtime credits and serving bill payments. As the business runs, he hopes to get a Kiva loan as working capital loan in order to do more transactions on weekends.

loans.use: To process more mobile phone credit sales on the weekends.

loans.name: Fadlun

texts.en:
Fadlun runs a small stall that sells mobile phone airtime credits and snacks. Fadlun lives in Purwokerto, an semi urban area about 10 hours from Jakarta. Fadlun is married and living with two people in the family home. 

Fadluni began working with Ruma one month ago because he wanted to increase his income. He feels really excited to expand his business of selling mobile phone airtime credits and serving bill payments. As the business runs, he hopes to get a Kiva loan as working capital loan in order to do more transactions on weekends.

loans.use: To process more mobile phone credit sales on the weekends.

loans.name: Carina

texts.en:
Carina's dreams in life are to enable her children to finish their studies until college and to have bus transportation for use in her business. 

Carina is married and has three children. She manages a motor parts business. Carina has been running the business for seven years and she is doing her best to manage it. Carina sells sprockets, car wheels, chains, bearings, reams and other motor parts. 

With her desire to expand the business and always have items in stock, Carina is requesting a loan of PHP 50,000. She will use the loan to buy additional wheels, chains, bearings and many more items. 

She will do her best to grow the business in order to sustain her family's needs, especially in pursuing her children's education. She hopes that her dream becomes real and she sees the fruit of her diligence and patience.

loans.use: to buy additional wheels, chains, bearings and many more items.

loans.name: Nury Felicia

texts.es: Nury de 66 años de edad  tiene un pequeño taller de confecciones donde elabora uniformes, blusas, faldas vestidos y todo lo que la demanda le solicite. Ella aprendió este oficio desde el año 1984, siguiendo la tradición de su madre quien se dedicó toda su vida a coser sobre medidas entre familiares vecinos y amigos.  Nury trabaja, durante todos los días desde las 7 de la mañana, hasta las 8 de la noche,  realizando todas las operaciones de preparación ensamble y acabado de piezas para finalmente vender el producto terminado a sus clientes, satisfaciendo así su demanda. Su meta principal es dotar su infraestructura productiva de mas máquinas y finalmente remodelar su vivienda, pero su mayor desafío es modernizar su talle fidelizar a su clientela y otorgar precios competitivos a su clientela. En la actualidad Nury está aplicando aun credikiva, mediante el cual comprará telas, accesorios hilos y una máquina de coser, con el objetivo de mejorar su productividad con mejoramiento de la prenda. Esta es justamente la razón de éxito de su inversión.
texts.en: Nury is 66 years old. She has a small sewing shop where she makes uniforms, blouses, skirts, dresses, and anything else people ask her to. She learned this trade in 1984. It was her mother's tradition, as her mother spent her whole life sewing for relatives, neighbors and friends. Nury works every day from 7 in the morning until 8 at night. She does all of the work of preparing the assembly and finishing of the pieces to finally sell the finished product to her customers, thus satisfying their demand. Her main goal is to increase her production infrastructure with more machines and finally remodeling her house, but her biggest challenge is modernizing her shop and gaining her customers' loyalty by offering them competitive prices. Right now, Nury is applying for a Kiva loan. With it, she will buy fabric, accessories, thread, and a sewing machine in order to improve her productivity with better clothing. This is exactly the reason why her investment is successful.

loans.use: to buy fabrics, accessories, thread and a sewing machine.

loans.name: Joyce

texts.en:
Joyce is a Ugandan married woman, age 37 years, with two children. 

She offers salon services coupled with selling shoes, from which she earns additional income to support her family. Although she is optimistic about the future, her business is still challenged by bad debtors. 

If a loan is given to her, she wants to add new stock of hair weaves and shoes to sell. 

Her future dream is to build rentals, which will help her increase her income.

loans.use: to add new stock of hair weaves and shoes to sell.

loans.name: Jacob Antonio

texts.es:
Jacob tiene 44 años de edad, estudio hasta 5to grado ya que por la situación económica que pasaba su familia no logró seguir estudiando, es padre de 3 hijos los cuales están estudiando en la escuela, está casado y su esposa se dedica a los oficios domésticos, y atiende una venta de sorbetes que tienen, en su vivienda habitan sus tres hijos y su esposa.

Jacob se dedica a la compraventa de gas propano el cual se lo traen a la casa y él lo distribuye en las diferentes tiendas y clientes que le piden servicio a domicilio, ya tiene 6 años en esta actividad, el oficio lo aprendió por iniciativa propia ya que antes trabajaba como transportista pero poco a poco su situación económica iba decayendo lo que lo obligó a vender sus carros de trabajo, pero en seguida su actual negocio creció , fue así como decidió meterse de lleno en esta actividad todo con el fin de mejorar la situación económica de su familia. La distancia del lugar donde trabaja es variable pues distribuye el producto en dos municipios aledaños al lugar donde vive y se moviliza en motocicleta, el horario también es variable porque está a la expectativa de la llamada de sus clientes para repartirles  el gas   

El préstamo lo utilizará para comprar 50 cilindros de gas, los que posee actualmente no le ajustan porque tiene demasiados clientes y a veces se queda sin producto y deja de percibir ganancias.

El sueño de Jacob es mejorar su negocio comprando más cilindros y en seguida hacerse de un carro para transportar su producto. En cuanto a su familia pretende ayudar a sus hijos para que ellos tengan la oportunidad de estudiar una carrera universitaria que les garantice un empleo digno en el futuro.
texts.en:
Jacob is 44 years old. He went to school up to the 5th grade, and due to the financial situation his family was going through, he wasn't able to keep going.  He is the father of 3 children who are in school. He is married and his wife takes care of the home and runs a little sorbet business they have. His three children and his wife live with him. 

Jacob works buying and selling propane gas. They bring it to his house and he distributes it to different stores and customers who want home delivery. He has been doing this activity for 6 years. He learned the trade on his own initiative. Previously, he worked as a a driver, but his financial situation was declining little by little and that made his have to sell off his work vehicles, but right away his present business grew. That is how he decided to do this activity full time so he could improve his family's financial situation. The distance he travels varies because he distributes in two towns nearby to where he lives and he gets around in a motorcycle. The schedule is also variable because he is on call to deliver gas to his customers. 

He will use the loan to buy 50 cylinders of gas. The ones he has now aren't enough because he has too many customers and sometimes he runs out of product and stops earning profits.  

Jacob's dream is to improve his business by buying more cylinders and then a car to transport his product. For his family, he intends to help his children so that they will have the opportunity to go to college which will guarantee them dignified work in the future.

loans.use: to buy 50 cylinders of gas.

loans.name: Ingrid Esmeralda

texts.es:
Ingrid tiene 31 años de edad, tuvo la oportunidad de estudiar hasta segundo grado debido al nivel de pobreza que tenia su familia, es madre soltera de 2 hijos y son los únicos que dependen de ella.

Ella se dedica a la agricultura, lo realiza de vez en cuando pero asegura tener un gran potencial y conocimiento para llevar a cabo dicha actividad, pero ahora Ingrid tiene la idea de iniciar con un negocio de venta de hotdogs. 

Ella necesita este crédito para comprar el carrito para vender hotdogs, de esta forma se le estará ayudando a que pueda iniciar su negocio y mejoren sus ingresos.

Ella sueña con ver a sus hijos graduados, y tengan buenas oportunidad para superarse.
texts.en:
Ingrid is 31 years old; she had the opportunity to study up to the second grade due to the level of poverty that her family had. She is a single mother of two children and they are the only people who depend on her.

She works in agriculture, which she does occasionally but she says she has great potential and knowledge to do this activity, but now Ingrid has an idea to open a business selling hot dogs.

She needs this loan to purchase a cart to sell hot dogs. In this way it will help her to be able to open her business and increase her income. 

Her dream is to see her children graduate, and have good opportunities to improve themselves.

loans.use: to purchase a cart to sell hot dogs.

loans.name: Ma Eulalia

texts.es: Ma Eulalia, tiene 37 años de edad, es madre soltera, tiene tres y reside en el municipio de Gracias Lempira. Siempre se ha dedicado a la agricultura, cultivando granos básicos como jornalera. Ahora tiene su propia finca de café en la zona montañosa. Saca su producción al mercado local para vender a los intermediarios. El préstamo que solicita es el tercer ciclo y es por 15,000 Lempiras,  y lo va invertir en la compra de fertilizantes para asistir la finca productora de café y cultivo de nuevas plantas de café, con el propósito de mejorar los ingresos. Su sueño  es desarrollarse como persona y seguir ayudando a sus hijos  y poder crecer con el negocio.
texts.en: Ma Eulalia, 37 years old, is a single mother and has three children. She lives in the municipality of Gracias Lempira. She has always worked in agriculture, growing basic grains as a day laborer. Now she has her own coffee plantation in the mountainous region. She brings her product to the local market to sell to intermediaries. The loan that she requests is the third loan cycle and is for 15,000 lempiras, and she will invest it in the purchase of fertilizers to help her coffee plantation production and cultivate new coffee plants, with the goal to increase her income. Her dream is to develop herself as a person and continue helping her children, and to be able to grow her business.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers for her farm and plant coffee plants.

loans.name: Victorino

texts.es:
Victorino, se dedica desde hace 10 años a ofrecer el servicio de transporte en un microbús  a diferentes lugares del país, al realizar este trabajo genera ingresos que utiliza para cubrir las necesidades básicas de su familia; el sr. Victorino vive junto a su esposa y dos hijos, son una familia muy unida.
Utilizará el capital para dar mantenimiento al microbús, cambio de llantas y aceite, de esta manera tendrá su unidad en óptimas condiciones para garantizar un buen servicio y seguridad a sus clientes. Espera tener mejores ganancias para resarcir su deuda sin problema alguno y cubrir las necesidades básicas de su familia.
Sus planes son mantenerse trabajando, reunir el capital suficiente para comprar un microbús en mejores condiciones.
texts.en:
Victorino has worked for 10 years offering transportation service in a minibus to different parts of the country. Doing this work generates income that he uses to pay for his family's basic needs. Victorino lives with his wife and two children; they are a very close family.

He will use the loan to maintain his minibus, change the tires and oil, and in this way he will have is vehicle in optimal condition to guarantee good service and security for his customers.  He hopes to have more profit to pay off his debt without any problems and to pay for his family's basic needs.

His plans are to continue working, and to raise enough capital to purchase a minibus in better condition.

loans.use: take care of his minibus, change the tires and oil.

loans.name: Maria Paz

texts.es:
María, nuevamente solicita un préstamo para invertirlo en la compra de materia prima para el negocio de venta de tortillas y pan artesanal, comprara maíz, harina, manteca, crema, azúcar, leña y levadura. Así su negocio se mantendrá continuo y sus ganancias serán estables.
 Con el préstamo anterior María ha mejorado la productividad de su negocio, tiene mayor popularidad en la zona, los ingresos para ir subsistiendo junto a su familia son estables y  mantiene un buen record crediticio.
texts.en:
María again asks for a loan to invest in the purchase of raw material for her business selling tortillas and artisan bread. She will purchase corn, flour, butter, cream, sugar, firewood, and yeast. In this way, the business will continue and her earnings will be stable.

With the previous loan, María has improved her business's productivity, she has more popularity in the region, her income to sustain her family are stable and she maintains a good credit record.

loans.use: to purchase corn, flour, butter, cream, sugar, firewood, and yeast.

loans.name: Wilbert Carlos

texts.es:
El socio Wilbert pertenece al banco comunal LOS ANGELES DE HUAYANAY, el banco está ubicado en el distrito de Santa Ana, provincia de La Convención y departamento de Cusco.

El socio tiene 42 años de edad es conviviente y tiene 02 hijos, el socio alterna sus actividades diarias dedicándose a la agricultura, el socio lleva buen tiempo dedicándose a este negocio el  cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día su negocio, a la vez el socio trabaja como guardián, el socio es una persona responsable y empeñoso, siendo de esta manera que el socio saca adelante a su familia.

El socio solicita el crédito para la compra de abono, semillas entre otros.

El socio se siente agradecido por el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
Wilbert belongs to the LOS ANGELES DE HUAYANAY communal bank, located in the district of Santa Ana, in the La Convención province and Cusco department. 

He is 42 years old, partnered and has 2 children. He alternates his daily activities working sometimes in agriculture. He has worked for a good amount of time in this business, which is going will thanks to the dedication that he puts forth each day, and he also works as a caretaker. He is a responsible and determined person, and in this way he gets ahead with his family. 

He asks for a loan to purchase fertilizer, seeds, and other supplies.

He is grateful for the loan that is offered and promises to make the established payments.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer, seeds, and other supplies.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy tools and spare parts for his repair shop and to repair his lorry.

loans.name: Amado

texts.es:
Amado, opta por solicitar más capital para mantener la continuidad de su negocio y seguir contando con la preferencia de sus clientes, comprará  hilos (de seda y nylon) y pagara mano de obra, para elaborar lazos y hamacas.
Con el crédito anterior cumplió con la entrega de sus pedidos en el tiempo acordado, aumento su producción y cuenta con nuevos clientes, su familia se encuentra en óptimas condiciones.
texts.en: Amado is requesting a new loan in order to keep his business going and retain his customers. He will buy silk and nylon thread and hire help to weave ribbons and hammocks. Thanks to the previous loan, he managed to fulfill customers' orders on time, increase his production and acquire new customers. His family is doing very well.

loans.use: to buy thread and to hire help.

loans.name: Siervas De Collpani Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “SIERVAS DE COLLPANI” iniciará el primer ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal de Collpani, está compuesta por nueve  integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva donde la señora Maria es la Presidenta. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos existen: venta de celulares, venta de ropa, tienda de ropa, taller de carpintería, venta de comida, tejido de mantas, venta de salchipapas (comida), venta de ají, venta de condimentos.

El crédito que sacaran beneficiara a pequeñas microempresarias donde la señora Maria es integrante, ella indica que es la primera vez integra Pro Mujer, ingresando por la invitación de una campaña masiva de la institución. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de  venta de celulares; da a conocer que este negocio lo implemento hace varios años, aprendiendo el mismo de su esposo que comercializaba este producto. 
 
El crédito que ahora sacará es para el aumento de capital (compra de celulares por mayor) que adquirirá de las vendedoras mayoristas de la ciudad de El Alto y posteriormente lo comercializará en su espacio de venta. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar a su familia, ya que ella es soltera y tiene un hijo.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta la capacitación del área de salud que ofrece la institución.
texts.en: Communal bank 'Siervas de Collpani' is starting its first lending cycle with Pro Mujer as part of the focus centre of Collpani. It is comprised of nine members and headed by Maria as president. Members carry out various types of activities: mobile phone sales, clothing sales, clothes shop, carpentry, food sales, cloth weaving, fast food shop, bell pepper sales, condiments sales. This loan will thus benefit small entrepreneurs. Maria says this is her first time working with Pro Mujer, and that she heard of this institution thanks to a massive campaign it organised. She operates a small mobile phone business and has been doing so for several years. She learned the trade from her husband, who also sold phones. She needs to increase her working capital to buy mobile phones wholesale from sellers in the city of El Alto. She will then sell them at her shop. This business generates income for her to support her family, since she is single and has a child. When asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, she mentions training received in the area of health.

loans.use: to buy mobile phones wholesale.

loans.name: Rouayat

texts.en:
Rouayat is a 53-year-old divorced mother of two. She struggles to provide for her children the best living, since her husband left her alone to care for them. She has a university degree, which enabled her to find work as a teacher in the past. Rouayat has been working as a supervisor in an orphanage for the last 12 years, making her a well-known and respected member of her community. 

Rouayat acquired a loan from Kiva’s field partner Al Majmoua in order to buy a car necessary for her transportation to work, and for her family's needs. In the future, she dreams to make further self-improvements, but more importantly, she hopes to provide her children with the best life possible.

loans.use: To buy a car necessary for her transportation to work in an orphanage, and for her family's needs

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase furniture to furnish his home (living room set).

loans.name: Noe Amilcar

texts.es: Noe tiene 51 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su compañera de vida de 53 años de edad. Noe es un hombre muy trabajador quien se dedica a la prestación de servicios de seguridad desde hace mucho tiempo. Noe desea construir un baño para lo cual solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de cemento, arena, ladrillo, hierro y pagará la mano de obra necesaria para la construcción.
texts.en: Noe is 51 years old and he lives in his own house with his life companion, who is 53 years old. Noe is a very hardworking man, who has worked for a long time providing security services. Noe wants to build a bathroom; therefore, he is requesting a loan from FUSAI to invest in buying cement, sand, brick, iron, and to pay for the needed labor costs for the construction.

loans.use: To buy cement, sand, brick, iron, and to pay for the needed labor costs to build a bathroom

loans.name: Lolita

texts.en:
Lolita is a resident of Cavite City, Philippines. She manages her own household while operating the business. At this time, she is working hard to continually provide income for the everyday expenses.

Lolita operates a market stall. She sells fruits and vegetable products in the community market. She buys quantities of fruits and vegetables and sells them per kilo. Her regular customers are her neighbors and the local community. She earns a minimum of 500 PHP (PHilippines pesos) in sales every day.

To help her continue operations of her business, she is requesting a 15,000 PHP loan. She will be utilizing the loan to buy more quantities of fruits and vegetables to expand her product inventory. She expects a boost in her business income as she expands her business.

Lolita hopes to improve her business so she can earn more. She only desires good health for every member of her family. She faithfully meets up with her co-fellowship members to share stories of her work every week, and this is where she can also draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies.

* All CCT community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and pay microfinance loans.

loans.use: To pay for fruits and other products needed in her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase more sugar, cooking oil, rice, washing powder and tea leaves

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To pay for efficient cooking energy from liquefied petroleum gas

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for school tuition for her son

loans.name: Celia

texts.es:
La socia Celia pertenece al banco comunal LOS ANGELES DE HUAYANAY, el banco está ubicado en el distrito de Santa Ana, provincia de La Convención y departamento de Cusco.
La socia  tiene 45 años de edad es casada y tiene 03 hijos, la socia alterna sus actividades diarias dedicándose al negocio de venta de ropa, la socia lleva buen tiempo dedicándose a este negocio el  cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día su negocio, a la vez la socia trabaja en un jardín de la zona, la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa, siendo de esta manera que la socia saca adelante a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de polos entre otros para su negocio.
La socia se siente agradecida por el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
Celia belongs to the communal bank Los Angeles de Huayanay. The bank is located in the district of Santa Ana, in the La Convención Province and the Cusco Department.

Celia is 45 years old. She is married and has three children. She alternates her daily activities, making a living from the business selling clothing. For a long time, she has made a living from this business, which has gone well thanks to the effort that she puts into her business every day. At the same time, she works in a kindergarten in the area. She is a responsible and determined person, and it is in this way that she brings her family out ahead.

Celia is requesting the loan to purchase polo shirts, among others, for her business.

Celia is thankful for the loan awarded and promises to make her established payments.

loans.use: to purchase polo shirts, among others, for her business.

loans.name: Richard

texts.en: Richard, a 45-year-old man, used the previous loan to buy fishing nets and boats. Richard is a farmer, stressing primarily coffee and banana farming. Richard wants to look after his children and hopes to get a land title in future , Richard is a hard-working person who is requesting for a loan to buy land and expand his coffee plantation; weather changes such as floods are a challenge affecting his business output.

loans.use: to buy land and expand  his coffee plantation

loans.name: Mellania

texts.en:
Mellania is 27 years old and a mother of two living in Zimbabwe’s Gokwe South District. She has been successfully running her business selling Kapenta fish (dried sardines) in her community for over two years. When she is not at her business, she volunteers as a peer educator in the community. 

With the requested Kiva loan, she intends to make bulk purchases of Kapenta fish (dried sardines) and packing material in the hope of supplying grocery stores at the local business center. With the additional profits she will be able to improve her family’s current standard of living.

loans.use: To make bulk purchases of Kapenta fish (dried sardines) and packing material in the hope of supplying grocery stores at the local business center.

loans.name: Arief

texts.en:
Arief runs a small stall which sells mobile phone airtime credits and mobile accessories. Arief lives in Purwokerto, a semi-urban area about 10 hours from Jakarta. Arief is married and living with four people in the family home. 

Arief began working with Ruma one month ago because he wants to increase his income.  He feels really excited to expand his business in selling mobile phone airtime credits and serving bill payments. As the business runs, he hopes to get a Kiva loan as working capital loan in order to do more transactions on weekends.

loans.use: To process more mobile phone credit sales on the weekends

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase more chicks and chick feeds

loans.name: Gulchehra

texts.en:
Gulchehra is a hardworking woman. She was born in 1977. Gulchehra is married and brings up two children. Her husband is a migrant in Russia. Gulchehra has been busy with selling vegetables such as potatoes and onions. She has worked in this way for more than five years. Gulchehra sells vegetables in the local market. She manages the business alone. Her working day begins early in the morning. She has regular customers because people every day use fresh vegetables. 

Gulchehra is going to increase her working capital. She is asking for a loan of 7,500 somoni to buy potatoes for increasing her working capital. She awaits your support.

loans.use: To buy potatoes for increasing her working capital

loans.name: Fedelita

texts.en:
Fedelita, 31 years of age, is married and blessed with three children. She has been into selling onions and garlic in the public market for almost 15 years and earning a net income of 20,000 PHP (Philippines pesos) weekly. Her net income is usually spent on the daily expenses at home. 

She would like to add to her capital in vending onions and garlic, so she's requesting a loan amounting to 50,000 PHP to purchase 100 sacks of onions and garlic to sell. She's hoping that her business will continue to grow and become more profitable.

loans.use: To purchase 100 sacks of onions and garlic to sell.

loans.name: Gilberto De Jesús

texts.es:
Gilberto tiene 52 años de edad, estudió hasta segundo grado de educación básica, está casado y su esposa se dedica al trabajo de oficios domésticos, tiene 4 hijos de los cuales 2 estudian y 2 le ayudan a trabajar a Gilberto en la agricultura.


Gilberto se dedica a la agricultura, ya que desde muy pequeño sus padres le enseñaron esta actividad, ahora la realiza porque le sirve para llevar el sustento a su familia, además, se dedica al trabajo de albañil, con el objetivo de siempre tener una fuente de trabajo.


Él necesita el crédito para comprar los insumos agrícolas para poder darle un buen manejo a su parcela de maíz,  comprará 7 sacos de fertilizantes, 2 bolsas de semillas, 2 bolsas de insecticida, bolsas de fertilizante foliar, y pagará la mano de obra. 

Gilberto espera darle un buen mantenimiento a la parcela para tener mas rentabilidad en la producción y asegurar la alimentación de su familia.
texts.en: Gilberto is 52 years old. He studied up to second grade of basic education. He is married and his wife works in domestic chores. He has 4 children: 2 are studying and 2 help Gilberto in farming.  Gilberto works in agriculture. Since he was very young his parents taught him this activity. Now he does it because it lets him support his family. He also works as a construction worker so that he always has a source of work. He needs the loan to buy agricultural inputs, so that he can manage well his plot of corn. He will buy 7 sacks of fertilizers, 2 bags of seeds, 2 bags of insecticides, bags of foliar based fertilizers, and he will pay for labor costs. Gilberto hopes to give a good upkeep to his parcel in order to make it more profitable in its production and ensure food for his family.

loans.use: to buy agricultural inputs for a good upkeep to his plot of corn: to buy 7 sacks of fertilizers, 2 bags of seeds, 2 bags of insecticide, bags of foliar based fertilizers, and to pay for labor costs.

loans.name: Maudy

texts.en:
Maudy is a 26-year-old businesswoman living in Zimbabwe’s Gokwe North District. She has been successfully operating a flea market for over two years now, where she sells dresses, blouses, shoes and jackets. When she is not busy in her flea market, she is volunteering as a Camfed Learner Guide at the local secondary school. 

With the loan she will make bulk purchases of dresses, jackets, shoes and skirts to improve sales and profits. With the proceeds from the business, she will be able to help with the upkeep of her family.

loans.use: To purchase more stock of dresses, jackets, shoes and skirts

loans.name: Felistas

texts.en:
Felistas is a 26-year-old businesswoman living in Gokwe South District, Zimbabwe. She rents a small stall at the local flea market where she sells cosmetic accessories, jackets and shirts. She started the business in 2013 and is very pleased with how far it has come. Felistas inspires young women in her community as both a Camfed Learner Guide and an entrepreneur. As a Learner Guide, Felistas teaches students life skills and encourages them to continue with their schooling. 

With the Kiva loan, she will purchase cosmetic accessories, jackets, panties, shirts and shoes to increase her stock levels. An increase in income will enable her to support herself and improve her family’s wellbeing.

loans.use: To purchase cosmetic accessories, jackets, panties, shirts and shoes to increase her inventory levels.

loans.name: Chinbayar

texts.en:
Mr.Chinbayar is 26 years old lives with his wife and 2-year-old daughter in Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. He has been working as a goldsmith for 3 years at the local service center. His wife is an accountant and his 5-year-old goes to kindergarten. 

Chinbayar is building a house on his plot of land and requesting 4,000,000 MNT (Mongolian tugrigs) to buy a block casting machine to finish his house. If he buys the block casting machine, he will do the blocks for his house himself and it will help him to build his house faster so this young family can feel a family warmth and comfort in their newly built home.

loans.use: to buy a block casting machine and building materials

loans.name: Dexter

texts.en:
Dexter has been operating a transportation business for many years and is earning good income for the family. With his income, he successfully repaid his previous loan used for hospitalization of one of his dependents. To continue his services, Dexter took a new loan to purchase new tires in order to replace the old, used ones. 

Dexter is hopeful to find ways to augment his living and be able to build his own house for his family.

loans.use: to purchase new tires

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy fuel and groceries [for resale].

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: buy medicinal herbs and canaris (earthenware containers)

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay tuition fees and buy a new computer for her environmental sciences studies.

loans.name: Sami

texts.en: Sami is a 24-year-old Palestinian who lives in a refugee camp. Eight years ago he started selling fish. He learned this profession from his father, who used to have a fish selling business of his own and was well trained to tell the difference between different kinds of fish. He has received a YOUTH loan from Kiva’s field partner Al Majmoua in order to complete construction on his house before his upcoming wedding. Sami hopes to build a suitable home within the camp, so that he and his wife can raise a happy and healthy family despite the poor economic conditions in the area.

loans.use: to complete construction on his house before his upcoming wedding.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more clothing material, lace and wax cotton for resale.

loans.name: Marites

texts.en: Marites is 37 years old and single. She runs a general store in the Philippines and applied for a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF in order to buy more groceries to sell. Marites has borrowed and repaid two loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for seven years, and she also earns income from food vending. Marites aspires to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more groceries to sell.

loans.name: Lillian

texts.en: Lillian is 29 years old, married, and has four children, three of whom attend school. Living in Kasese, Uganda, Lillian operates a motor vehicle spare parts shop and has been in that business for six years. Lillian has rentals as an additional source of income; she works very hard towards expanding her business in order to look after her family. Lillian is applying for a loan to buy motor vehicle spare parts to sell.

loans.use: to buy motor vehicle spare parts to sell.

loans.name: Hatunchaskas Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “HATUNCHASKAS”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Erika ella es soltera y tiene 35 años; La socia trabaja en su negocio de venta de ropa, la socia vende pantalones, blusas y polos, la socia ya tiene varios años en este negocio y le va muy bien, el sueño de la socia es tener un bazar. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar zapatos, polos, chompas, polos y blusas.

Los otros socios se dedican al negocio de venta de artesanía, negocio de venta de ropa, negocio de tienda de abarrotes y negocio de carpintería.



La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
These are members that belong to the communal bank “Hatunchaskas.” This bank is located in the Cusco District, belonging to the Cusco Province and the Cusco Department.

This member is Erika. She is single and is 35 years old. She works in her business selling clothing. She sells pants, blouses, and t-shirts. She has already worked for many years in this business and it is going very well. Her dream is to have a stationery shop. She is requesting this loan to purchase shoes, polo shirts, sweaters, t-shirts, and blouses.

The other members make a living from selling crafts, selling clothing, a grocery store, and carpentry.

Erika is thankful to those who forma a part of this dream through this means, and she promises to make her payments in the established time frame.

loans.use: to purchase shoes, polo shirts, sweaters, t-shirts, and blouses.

loans.name: Nasiba

texts.en: Nasiba is a young and purposeful woman. She is twenty-six years old. Nasiba is the careful mother of a little child. Two years ago, Nasiba began her own business dealing in animal husbandry. She feeds cows and sells them in a local market. She feeds the cows in her house, where she has a cowshed. Nasiba feeds four cows now. She manages her business alone. She works hard to earn a living but it is not enough to improve her living conditions. She is going to increase her working capital. Nasiba is asking for a loan of TJS 2,500 to buy cattle. She awaits your support.

loans.use: To buy cattle

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: buy shoes

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: buy firewood

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay the rent on her mini-cafe.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more sugar, milk, drinks and biscuits for resale.

loans.name: Aisha

texts.en: Aisha is thirty-eight years old and married with five children living in Kasese, Uganda. Aisha operates a retail shop selling wraps for women (called "bitenge"), having been in that business for nine years. Aisha started the business with the aim of looking after her family. She is a hard working woman who looks forward to expanding her business so she can have a stable income. She is requesting a loan to buy wraps for women, which she will resell. This will allow her to meet her customer's demands in spite of heavy competition.

loans.use: buy wraps for women (called "bitenge")

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy bananas to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: purchase bags of rice, cartons of salt, drinks and sugar

loans.name: Jose Fernando

texts.es:
José, sigue trabajando muy duro para salir a delante junto a su familia, solicitará un nuevo crédito para comprar abono, semilla, herbicidas, plaguicidas, insecticidas, pagara alquiler de terreno y mozos. Continuara sembrando granos básicos y mejorando el estilo de vida de su familia.
Para José el crédito anterior le ayudo tener los insumos agrícolas para cultivar granos básicos y el alimento necesario para su ganado.
texts.en:
José continues working very hard in order to get ahead together with his family. He will request a new loan to buy fertilizer, seeds, herbicides, pesticides, insecticides, and to pay the workers and rent the land.  He will continue growing basic grains and improving his family’s lifestyle.

The previous loan helped José to have the agricultural supplies to grow basic grains and the feed needed for his livestock.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, seeds, herbicides, pesticides, insecticides, and to pay the workers and rent the land.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy cement, sand, brick and iron in order to construct a retention wall for her home.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: buy food

loans.name: Blanca Isolina

texts.es:
Blanca de 60 años de edad, no pudo estudiar debido a los pocos recursos económicos de su familia y en aquellos tiempos las escuelas estaban muy lejos, está acompañada y su pareja tiene una panadería, tiene 4 hijos los cuales ya formaron sus propios hogares, en casa de Blanca solo vive una nieta que estudia bachillerato.

Blanca aprendió a hacer el pan desde que estaba muy joven, tiene 19 años de dedicarse a la panadería decidió hacer esa actividad porque no encontró otra forma de ayudar a su familia para salir adelante y colaborar en los gastos de la casa, con su esposo pusieron su propio puesto de panadería para la cual va a comprar los insumos a la ciudad, recorre 34 kilómetros y paga transporte para hacer llegar la mercadería hasta su casa, y trabaja en  un horario de 7:00 AM a 7:00 PM.


El préstamo será invertido para la reparación de un vehículo en el que se sale a vender el pan, el préstamo mejorará su negocio porque tendrá la oportunidad de satisfacer la demanda de pan.

Ella sueña con aumentar las ventas y con eso tener mejores ingresos, con lo que podrá cubrir sus necesidades y las de su familia.
texts.en:
Blanca, age 60, was not able to go to school due to the few financial resources her family had.  Also, in those times the schools were very far away.  She is in a relationship, and her life partner has a bakery.  She has four children, and they have their own households.  Only a granddaughter, who goes to high school, lives in her Blanca’s house.

Blanca learned to make bread when she was very young.  She has been working in the bakery business for 19 years.  She decided on this business activity because she could not find another way of helping her family get ahead and of contributing to the household expenses.  She and her husband set up their own bakery stand.  She goes to the city to buy the supplies.  She travels 34 kilometers and pays for transportation for the merchandise to get to her house.  She works from 7:00 a.m. until 7:00 p.m.

She will use the loan to repair the vehicle, which she uses to sell the bread.  The loan will improve her business because she will have the opportunity to satisfy the demand for bread.  She dreams of increasing sales and having better income.  She will use the income to be able to cover her necessities and those of her family.

loans.use: to repair the vehicle, which she uses to sell the bread.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase sweetened bread

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: buy fabrics and plastic-ware

loans.name: Manuel De Jesus

texts.es:
Manuel, tiene un negocio de taller reparación de refrigeración, aire acondicionado entre otros artículos, tiene 11 años de poseerlo, lo atiende solo en un horario de 2:00 p.m. a 5:00 p.m., al prendió el oficio por medio de cursos, su mayor ventaja es que por la ubicación no tiene competencia; Manuel es soltero, vive junto a su madre quien depende económicamente de él. 
Comprará gas refrigerante, aislantes, filtros, cables, tornillos, mangueras, etc., tendrá los repuestos que necesita para trabajar y brindar una buena atención a sus clientes, espera atraer más clientes y aumentar sus ingresos económicos.
Su sueño es ampliar el negocio y brindar una mejor calidad de vida a su familia.
texts.en:
Manuel has a repair shop for refrigerators, air conditioners, and other appliances. He has had this business for 11 years, and works from 2 until 5 in the afternoon. He learned his trade by taking courses, and his biggest advantage is that the location of his business doesn't have any competition. 

Manuel is single and lives with his mother, who depends on him financially.

With the loan, he will buy coolant, insulation, filters, cables, screws, hoses, etc. He will have the spare parts he needs to work and provide quality service to his clients. He hope to bring in new business and increase his income. 

His dream is to grow his business and provide his family with a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy coolant, insulation, filters, cables, screws, hoses, etc.

loans.name: Narciso

texts.es:
Narciso, invirtió el préstamo anterior la compra de una vaca y los insumos agrícolas para preparar el terreno en el que realiza sus cultivos y protegió las cosechas de plagas, su familia goza de un mejor estilo de vida y cancelo su deuda.
Como ya se acerca la época justa para sembrar opta por un nuevo crédito para comprar semilla, insecticidas, fertilizantes, herbicidas y abono; de esta forma mantendrá continuo su trabajo.
texts.en: Narciso invested the last loan buying a cow and agricultural inputs to prepare the earth so that he could undertake his planting and protect his crops from infestations. His family benefited from a better quality of living and he paid back the loan. As the planting season is now approaching he has decided to take another loan to buy seeds, insecticide, fertilizers, herbicides and manure. In this way he can continue with his work.

loans.use: to buy seeds, insecticides, fertilizer, herbicides and manure.

loans.name: Jose Humberto

texts.es:
José, se decidió por un nuevo préstamo para continuar mejorando su situación familiar y fortalecer su negocio, comprara abono e insecticidas, lo utilizara para darle mantenimiento al cultivo de maíz y frijol, que está en proceso de producción. 
El sr.: José con la ayuda del crédito anterior logro una mejoro productividad de sus cultivos, con los que ha tenido buenas ganancias, que utiliza para cambiar el estilo de vida de su familia y cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas.
texts.en: José has decide to take a new loan to continue to improve his family's situation and strengthen his business. He will buy manure and insecticide which he will use to maintain his corn and bean crops that are under production. With the help of the last loan José managed higher productivity with his crops which yielded him good profit. He used this to change the lifestyle of the family and pay the installments of his loan.

loans.use: to buy manure and insecticides.

loans.name: Liliana Emperatriz

texts.es: Liliana tiene 23 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su esposo y su hijo de 3 años y una prima de 22 años de edad. Liliana es una mujer muy trabajadora quien junto a su esposo mantienen la economía del hogar. Hace unos meses dieron inicio a la construcción de su vivienda con el fin de mejorar sus condiciones habitacionales pero por falta de recursos económicos no han logrado terminar. Por lo anterior solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de puertas y ventanas para la vivienda.
texts.en: Liliana is 23 years old and lives in her house with her husband, her 3 year-old son, and her 22 year-old cousin. Liliana is a very hard working woman who, alongside her husband, takes care of the household expenses. A few months ago, they began construction on their home with the goal of improving their living conditions; however, due to a lack of financial resources, they have not been able to finish the project. For this, she is asking for this loan from FUSAI to invest in the purchase of doors and windows for her home.

loans.use: to buy doors and windows for her home.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase phone-minutes cards

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase fruit

loans.name: Dúo Mayito Group

texts.es:
DUO MAYITO
Incorporado por la señora Sandra Marisol  quien es viuda y madre de 2 niñas las cuales aun estudian, ella tiene una tienda en donde tiene la mayoría de productos y granos básicos ya hace 6 años que tiene su negocio después de la muerte de su esposo para ella fue muy difícil poder levantarse moralmente pero que gracias a DIOS ha podido salir adelante con su negocio ella sueña con que sus hijas sean personas de bien y que luchen día con día  para poder ser personas de éxitos.Esta solicitando este credito para la compra de productos comestibles.
texts.en: The communal bank "Duo Mayito" includes Sandra Marisol, who is a widow and is the mother of 2 daughters who are still in school.  She has a shop where she sells many products and consumer staples.  She's had this business for 6 years.  After the death of her husband it was very hard for her to lift herself up morally, but thanks to God she has been able to continue forward with her business.  Sandra Marisol dreams that her daughters will become good people, and that they will strive each day to become successful people.  She is requesting this loan to buy food products.

loans.use: to buy food products to sell

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: El cliente de 21 años de edad vive en casa propia con su madre y su padre, el se dedica a cultivar la tierra junto a su padre su principal siembra es arroz, comercializa sus cultivos en los diferentes mercados que se encuentran cerca de su lugar de residencia, el cliente está solicitando un crédito para la compra de insumos para su siembra como: fertilizantes, abonos, controles de plagas, herbicidas, etc.  y así poder seguir cultivando y tener una fuente de ingresos y aspirar a una mejor calidad de vida junto con su familia.
texts.en: The client is 21 years old and lives in his own house with his mother and father. He works the land together with his father. Their main crop is corn which they sell in the different markets in their area. The client is requesting a loan to buy inputs for his crops like fertilizer, manure, pest control, herbicides, etc  so that he can continue farming and have a source of income. He hopes to enjoy a better quality of living together with his family.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, manure, pest control, herbicides, etc.

loans.name: Jose Israel

texts.es:
José, se decidió por un nuevo crédito para realizar las diferentes actividades para la próxima siembra de granos básicos, comprara abono, semilla, plaguicidas, insecticidas, herbicidas y pagara mozos, continuara trabajando y llevando el sustento diario a su hogar.
Con el préstamo anterior tuvo como resultado una cosecha abundante y de calidad, también apoyo a su esposa para mejorar el local en donde elabora la venta de tortillas, las circunstancias familiares han mejorado positivamente.
texts.en:
Jose decided to apply for a new loan in order to carry out various activities for the next planting season of basic grains. He will buy manure, seeds, pesticides, insecticides, and herbicides, pay his workers, and continue working and feeding his family each day. 

With the previous loan, he had a quality, high-yield harvest and also helped his wife improve the conditions where she produces and sells tortillas. The circumstances for his family have improved positively.

loans.use: to buy manure, seeds, pesticides, insecticides, and herbicides, and to pay his workers.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for school tuition and buy educational materials for her daughter

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase rice

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase sugar, mayonnaise, drinks and pure water to expand her business.

loans.name: María Marta

texts.es:
María de 45 años de edad, estudió hasta segundo grado, es madre soltera, junto a ella vive su hijo de 24 años de edad  quien está acompañado pero trabaja,  de los ingresos de María solo depende sus nietas.

Ella vende productos de revista, ya tiene más de cinco años de dedicarse a esta actividad, la necesidad de tener un ingreso para su hogar la obligo a tomar acciones por su propia cuenta, también una amiga le ayudó a establecer el contacto con los vendedores de los productos, no tiene más actividades a las que se dedique, antes de comenzar al negocio, ella lavaba ropa ajena, la distancia que recorre cada día que sale a vender es aproximadamente de unos cinco kilómetros, ya que la venta la realiza de casa en casa por las colonias vecinas, no se involucra nadie más a la actividad, el trabajo lo realiza de 6:00 a 10:00 am. 


María necesita el crédito para invertir en el negocio, pagará algunos productos que pidió para luego venderlos, ya que tuvo gastos en salud y por eso no pudo hacer el pago, con esto podrá seguir trabajando para el sustento 
Del hogar.

María sueña con aumentar  poco a poco  las ventas y la clientela, tener una mejor estabilidad, espera que el negocio le dé más  resultado y así formar su propio capital de trabajo.
texts.en:
María is 45 years old and studied up to Grade 2. She is a single mother who lives with her 24 year old son who is in a common-law relationship and works. Only her grandchildren depend on María income. She sells products from catalogs. She has had more than 5 years experience in this field.

The need to have an income for her household made her take action for herself and a friend helped her establish contact with the sellers of the products. She has no other work she does. Before she started this work she washed clothing for other people.The distance she covers each day going out to sell is about 5 km. She sells house to house in neighboring areas and no one else in involved in her work. She works from 6 am until 10 am.

María needs the loan to invest in her business and to pay for a few articles that people have ordered that she will sell to them. She also has had medical expenses so she couldn't pay for the orders. With the loan she will be able to continue her work to support her household. María dreams of increasing her sales and clientele little by little and have more stability. She hopes that her business produces better results so she can have her own working capital.

loans.use: to purchase more products from catalogs including lotions, cosmetics, and lingerie.

loans.name: Ferial

texts.en: Ferial is a forty-eight-year-old married mother of four. Her husband left home to seek better work opportunities abroad and Ferial quit school at an intermediate level. A few months ago she established her own housewares shop, a profession she learned when she lived in Africa. She was a little underwhelmed by the profit margin she was making when she first started her business, but now her business is doing well. She is acquiring a loan from Kiva’s field partner Al Majmoua to diversify her inventory: she wants to add special beach products to coincide with the arrival of the summer. One day she hopes to expand her shop so she can increase her sales and improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: buy special beach products to diversify her inventory during the summer months

loans.name: Ana Gloria

texts.es: Ana tiene 35 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su madre y su hijo de 10 años de edad quien se encuentra estudiando. La principal fuente de motivación de Ana es su querida familia y es por ella que se esfuerza y trabaja muy duro para llevar el sustento diario. Ella se dedica a la venta de variedad prendas de vestir desde hace 10 años y de esta forma es como mantiene la economía de su familia. Ana solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en su negocio en la compra variedad de prendas de vestir como: faldas, vestidos, pantalones, ropa interior, etc. Para satisfacer una mayor demanda y mejorar sus ventas e ingresos.
texts.en:
Ana, 35, lives in her own house with her mother and ten-year-old son who is studying at school at the moment. The main source of motivation for Ana is her beloved family.  She makes an effort and works hard every day to provide for them. 

She sells a range of clothing, an activity she has been doing for ten years.  This allows her to take care of household expenses. 

Ana is asking for a loan from FUSAI to invest in clothes for her business such as skirts, dresses, pants, underwear, etc.  She hopes this will satisfy the greater customer demand and improve her sales and profits.

loans.use: to buy skirts, dresses, pants, underwear, etc.

loans.name: Isabel

texts.en: Isabel is sixty, widowed and the mother of five children. For nearly thirty-three years, she has managed a farming business, specifically rice farming. Last crop, her net income was PHP 60,000. She spent this income on her children's school allowances and hog raising business. Due to a lack of capital in her business, she would like to apply for a loan amounting to PHP 40,000 to purchase fertilizers, insecticides and seedlings for her farm. She's hoping that her business will continue to grow and become more profitable.

loans.use: To purchase fertilizers, insecticides and seedlings for her farm.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase sewing supplies

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy food supplies and wholesale goods.

loans.name: Dúo Flautas Azucenas Group

texts.es:
Dúo Flautas Azucenas
Las señoras Erilla quien es madre de 2 hijos de los cuales tiene una niña a su cargo la señora Erilla es propietaria de una venta de comida rápida  como flautas, gringas pupusas, licuados etc. los cuales tiene en su mismo domicilio ella lleva 15 años dedicándose a la venta del mismo y gracias a DIOS ha logrado hacer algunas cosas de su casa con las ganancias que ha obtenido pero  en esta ocasión ella solicita de kiva un crédito para poder obtener insumos y algún equipo para su negocio ya que desea y anhela aun mas poder llevar a cabo metas que aún le faltan  y agradece que se le tome en cuenta dicha solicitud
texts.en: Erilla is a member of the communal bank "Duo Flautas Azucenas."  She has 2 children, of which one daughter is in her care.  Erilla owns a fast food business.  She sells flautas, tacos, pupusas, smoothies, etc., from her home.  Erilla has had this business for 15 years, and thanks to God she has been able to do some things in her home with the earnings that she has obtained.  However, at this time she is requesting a Kiva loan to buy supplies and some equipment for her business, because she wants to accomplish even more goals.  She thanks those who are considering funding this loan.

loans.use: to buy supplies to  make and sell food

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for a fellowship.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies and labor costs.

loans.name: Maria Marta

texts.es: Doña María, de 48 años de edad, es madre soltera, vive junto a su hijo, nuera y nieta, reside en una aldea que pertenece al municipio de Villanueva, Cortes. Hace 3 años que doña María decidió poner su propio negocio de pulpería para obtener los ingresos necesarios, ella vende manteca, arroz, azúcar, frijoles, harina, jabón, churros, condimentos, verduras y otros productos básicos. Anteriormente trabajaba en una maquila y con los ingresos empezó su negocio. Esta solicitando el tercer ciclo de préstamo que es por 12,000 Lempiras con el cual va comprar arroz, maíz, frijoles, productos de limpieza, harina, manteca, azúcar y otros que necesite para surtir mas su negocio y seguir trabajando. Su plan es poder  generar ingresos necesarios para el sustento familiar.
texts.en:
Maria, 48, is a single mother who lives together with her son, daugher-in-law and granddaughter in a village of Villanueva in Cortes. 

Three years ago, Maria decided to set up her own business with a grocery store so that she would be able to generate a necessary income.  She sells butter, rice, sugar, beans, flour, soap, churros, condiments, vegetables and other basic goods.   

She used to work in an assembly line and with the money she saved, she was able to start her own business.
